sect1.title: General
sect1.para:
The SW-component Chorus_HSI has the subcomponent HardwareVersion that acts like an interface. It implements the application logic of reading the current HW version and base variant from defined OTP flash memory area. This is necessary because for other SW modules, APIs are available and they will request the HW version and base variant in a readable format.
Also, the HardwareVersion subcomponent also implements PostBuildHandler functionality that offers function to select the required PB configuration during startup, accirdung to the current ECU variant.
This component is split in 2 other subcomponents:
HardwareVersion: provides the implementation for getting the information needed regarding getting the hardware version type, base variant and hardware version number.
PostBuildHandler:provides the implementation for the function to choose the right post build configuration.
